titleStmt.title: Timothy Touchstone his reply to Mr. Christian's letter written in vindication of the great worth and innocence of the Earl of Danby.
titleStmt.author: Touchstone, Timothy.

notesStmt.note: Crawford, J.L.L. Cat. of Engl. broadsides gives 1710 as probable date of publication.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
